title: Refresh brand logo to a bold, youthful, forward-thinking typographic style

requirements.text: Create a new typographic logo design for “Ocean Empowerer Solutions” that uses a bold, unique font style and a color treatment that feels young, forward-thinking, and growth-oriented, while remaining highly legible at small sizes.

quotes: We want logo design like think bold and unique font it aiming grow up that colour is indicated young and forward thinking

acceptanceCriteria: New logo design direction is clearly typographic (font-led) and reads as bold/unique
Color treatment communicates a youthful and forward-thinking brand impression
Logo remains readable at header size (approx. 36–40px tall) and icon size (256x256)

requirements.text: Update the frontend to use the new logo assets everywhere the brand logo appears by updating frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts and any remaining hardcoded logo references (e.g., social meta tags in frontend/index.html) to point to the new generated filenames.

quotes: We want logo design like think bold and unique font it aiming grow up that colour is indicated young and forward thinking

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts points to the new horizontal, icon, and social logo asset paths under /assets/generated/
The header and footer logo render the new horizontal logo via BRAND_ASSETS.logoHorizontal
OpenGraph/Twitter social image in frontend/index.html uses the new social logo asset filename (not the old one)
SEO structured data continues to use BRAND_ASSETS.logoSocial (no regression)

requirements.text: Ensure the newly generated logo image files are included as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and that the app builds and renders without broken image links.

quotes: We want logo design like think bold and unique font it aiming grow up that colour is indicated young and forward thinking

acceptanceCriteria: All new logo files exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the expected filenames
No missing-image placeholders or 404s occur for logo assets in header, footer, or social meta image

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components).
Do not edit immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this logo update.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the full site layout or section content beyond updating logo asset references.
Do not change authentication or contact form/backend message storage behavior.

edits: Update to a bold, unique, youthful, forward-thinking typographic logo style with a growth-oriented color treatment (premium-logo-horizontal-lightblue.dim_512x128.png > bold-youthful-logo-horizontal.dim_512x128.png)
Update to a matching bold, unique icon-style logo mark suitable for small sizes (premium-logo-icon-lightblue.dim_256x256.png > bold-youthful-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png)
Update to a matching bold, unique wide logo lockup suitable for social sharing previews (ocean-empowerer-solutions-logo-lightblue.dim_512x256.png > bold-youthful-logo-social.dim_512x256.png)
